vlive.korean: 처음으로 받은 상임과 동시에... It was our first award and ... 듣기 View video B.I.G : B.I.G(비아이지) 데뷔 2주년 기념파티
vlive.english: It was our first award and ...

examples.korean: Congratulations on your new position as a senior researcher. 발음듣기 상임연구원으로 새로 임명되신 것을 축하드립니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: Congratulations on your new position as a senior researcher. 발음

examples.korean: a permanent / first appointment 발음듣기 영구적인[상임]/첫 직책 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
This e-mail is to recommend Mr. Shin-soo Lee for the position of senior engineer at your company. 발음듣기 이 이메일은 귀사 상임 엔지니어 직에 이신수 씨를 추천하기 위한 것입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: This e-mail is to recommend Mr. Shin-soo Lee for the position of senior engineer at your company. 발음

examples.korean: The company usually follows the recommendations of the standing advisory committee. 발음듣기 그 회사는 대개 상임자문위원회의 권고를 따른다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The company usually follows the recommendations of the standing advisory committee. 발음

examples.korean: It's about Jim Wilson, one of your new senior graphic designers. 발음듣기 당신의 새로운 상임 그래픽 디자이너 중 한 명인 Jim Wilson 씨에 대한 것입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: It's about Jim Wilson, one of your new senior graphic designers. 발음
